snippet.title: Monster Truck McQueen in India Driving ( MOD ) - Bus Simulator Indonesia 3D #104 - Android GamePlay
snippet.description:
❤ Subscribe to Channel : https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCGu9-9FqQtXAitxkOnHzz6Q?sub_confirmation=1
   ↓ More Information & App Download ↓
➔ Download Games : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.maleo.bussimulatorid
➔ Game Developer : Maleo
➔ MOD Monster Truck McQueen
➔ What's new : Monster Truck McQueen in India Driving
- Indian Cargo Truck Trailer MAN Driving in India
- bug fixes (Link Google Account, black screen after ads, etc)
- big update on graphic quality
- vehicle damage and repair system
- vehicle dirtiness and washing system
- new cities (in kalimantan, sulawesi & sumatera)
- map assets management system for storage optimization
- Luxury Coach Big NEW Indian Bus Driving in India
- Indian Cargo Truck Isuzu Deca Bak Dropside Driving

➔ Bus Simulator Indonesia (aka BUSSID) will let you experience what it likes being a bus driver in Indonesia in a fun and authentic way. BUSSID might not be the first one, but it’s probably one of the only bus simulator games with the most features and the most authentic Indonesian environment.

McQueen Monster Truck in India 3D
- Design your own livery
- Very easy and intuitive control
- Authentic Indonesian cities and places
- Indonesian Buses
- Cool and fun honks
- High quality and detailed 3D graphics
- No obstructive ads while driving
- Leaderboard
- Data saved online
- Use your own 3D model using vehicle mod system
- Online multiplayer convoy
- Bus Simulator Indonesia
